Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Antonia Araceli Ibáñez at a golf tournament in Madrid. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Antonia Araceli Ibáñez is a 42 year old CEO from Spain.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Antonia Araceli Ibáñez is currently divorced. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2000, Antonia finished her secondary school education at Colegio El Pilar Getafe.
Antonia received her degree from University of the Basque Country in 2006.
Additionally, she went on to study at Polytechnic University of Madrid until 2009.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 19 years, Antonia Araceli Ibáñez has established herself as a key player in the industry.
At Almirall S.A., Antonia Araceli Ibáñez held the position of Research Scientist from 2006 to 2011, developing essential skills in the field.
She then transitioned to Zeltia S.A. as a Biotech Startup Founder, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2012 to 2014.
She spent 10 years working as a CEO at PharmaMar S.A., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 160000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She is not confident in her investment decisions and prefers to seek professional advice.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: house located in Barcelona, valued at approximately 1,447,000.00 EUR, flat located in Oviedo, valued at approximately 950,000.00 EUR, condo located in Bilbao, valued at approximately 850,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Bilbao, Oviedo and Barcelona.
In 2013, she received an inheritance of 3190000 EUR from her late grandmother, who was a prominent Private Equity Manager, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Antonia has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
